attributes.comment:
Use of the term "provider" is outmoded and inappropriate for physicians and other health professionals, and CMS should decide who they are referring to in the proposed rule. If CMS is referring to health professionals or clinicians, these terms should be used. If only referring to physicians, the term physicians should be used. Individuals concerned with a national directory don't know who you mean when using the term "provider", which is universally resented by health professionals.
Lyle Swenson, MD
Stillwater, MN

attributes.title: Comment on CMS-2022-0163-0001
